summary.span: 对象控制创建 Web 浏览器控件的能力。

span.span: The object controls the ability to create the WebBrowser control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中，Web 浏览器控件启用浏览 HTML 框架。In the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), the Web browser control enables frames to navigate HTML. 此权限将使用的值枚举。This permission uses the values of the enumerations. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此类。This class is not typically used in XAML.

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员通常不在 XAML 中使用，或不能在 XAML 中使用。Members of this class are either not typically used in XAML, or cannot be used in XAML.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限和指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 两个权限的交集是对它们共同描述的状态进行描述的权限。

span.span: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state that they both describe in common.

returns.span: 对于相交的权限，只有同时满足两个原始权限的请求才是有效的。

span.span: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will be valid for the intersected permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员通常不在 XAML 中使用，或不能在 XAML 中使用。Members of this class are either not typically used in XAML, or cannot be used in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员通常不在 XAML 中使用，或不能在 XAML 中使用。Members of this class are either not typically used in XAML, or cannot be used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method.
